summary: Documentation search index was returning a deprecated `workflowClient` interface reference that led to a 404 page. The interface was replaced with `TestWorkflowEnvironment.workflowClient` but the search index hadn't been updated.
userImpact: Users following search results encounter 404 errors when trying to access deprecated API documentation.
rootCause: Documentation indexing delay - the search index included references to deprecated APIs that were replaced but not yet reflected in the index.
proposedFix: Either remove deprecated entries from search index or implement redirects from old API references to their replacements.
resolutionDetails: Issue was resolved by waiting for the next manual documentation index rebuild which removed the stale references.
keyQuote: Indexing is once/week or manual. Last one was 3h ago, and this issue was fixed.
